title: "Exploring the Construction of Reality: Quantum Physics and Mental Processes"
first_phrase: In the previous section, we explored how our nervous system constructs a physical reality for utilitarian purposes through cause-effect relations between distinct objects. However, physicists suggest a different reality, where even time is a construction. In this final section, we delve into the teachings of Moshe Feldenkreis and the Quantum Psi System to expand consciousness through quantum methods. The program includes techniques like breathing, sound, and spiral movements to guide a session and solve problems creatively. The second day explores self-hypnosis and advanced PNL techniques to attain certification in the Master of Ipnomentalism.
content: Questo crea dei “punti di vista” ed è all’origine delle nostre credenze e pensieri e ci porta a scegliere un cammino di pensiero fisso invece che un altro non rendendoci conto delle possibilità che invece il mondo continuamente ci offre davanti. “Lo scopo del sistema nervoso è quello di organizzare il caos”. last_phrase: In conclusion, understanding how our viewpoints and beliefs are formed can expand our awareness of the possibilities around us. Consider exploring the Quantum Psi system and the techniques of Ipnomentalism and Hypnofascination to further enhance your consciousness and communication skills.
